manipulations.insert_object: Insert a large, colorful beach ball bouncing slightly behind the skateboarder, casting a subtle shadow on the road.
manipulations.reflection_shadow_edit: Add a longer, more dramatic shadow of the skateboarder stretching out horizontally on the road, respecting the sun's angle.
manipulations.style_material_change: Make the skateboard appear to be made of solid gold, reflecting the surrounding light realistically.
manipulations.replace_background: Replace the background with a photorealistic Martian landscape, complete with red sand and distant mountains.
manipulations.physics_event: Add a large dust cloud kicking up behind the skateboard, simulating a sudden brake or turn.
